lead_paragraph: LeBron James has often avoided talking about trying to match Michael Jordan's accomplishments. Now he's chasing "the ghost" of arguably the greatest player in NBA history.

headline.main: LeBron Tells SI He's Motivated by 'Ghost' of Michael Jordan
headline.print_headline: LeBron Tells SI He's Motivated by 'Ghost' of Michael Jordan

snippet: LeBron James has often avoided talking about trying to match Michael Jordan's accomplishments. Now he's chasing "the ghost" of arguably the greatest player in NBA history....
